0.text: Innate: Tahm Kench's basic attacks  on-hit and  Tongue Lash are empowered to deal 8 − 60 (based on level) (+ 3% of his bonus health) bonus magic damage, and apply a stack of An Acquired Taste against enemy  champions lasting 5 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 3 times. Stacks expire by 1 every 0.67 seconds.
0.html: Innate: Tahm Kench's basic attacks on-hit and Tongue Lash are empowered to deal 8 − 60 (based on level) (+ 3% of his bonus health) bonus magic damage, and apply a stack of An Acquired Taste against enemy champions lasting 5 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 3 times. Stacks expire by 1 every 0.67 seconds.
markedPassages: on-hit
Tongue Lash
champions

1.text: Tongue Lash and  Devour gain additional effects against enemies with 3 stacks, consuming them all.
1.html: Tongue Lash and Devour gain additional effects against enemies with 3 stacks, consuming them all.
markedPassages: Tongue Lash
Devour

0.text: Active: Tahm Kench lashes his tongue in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and  slows them by 50% for 2 seconds. If this hits an enemy  champion, Tahm Kench also  heals himself.
0.html: Active: Tahm Kench lashes his tongue in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and slows them by 50% for 2 seconds. If this hits an enemy champion, Tahm Kench also heals himself.
markedPassages: slows
champion
heals
(+ 8 − 60 (based on level) (+ 3% bonus health))
(+ 8 − 60 (based on level) (+ 3% bonus health))
(+ 8 − 60 (based on level) (+ 3% bonus health))

1.text: An Acquired Taste Bonus: The target is  stunned for 1.5 seconds.  Devour can be cast during Tongue Lash at no cost to pull the target to Tahm Kench before swallowing them.
1.html: An Acquired Taste Bonus: The target is stunned for 1.5 seconds. Devour can be cast during Tongue Lash at no cost to pull the target to Tahm Kench before swallowing them.
markedPassages: An Acquired Taste
stunned
Devour

2.text: Tahm Kench is  unable to move, attack, or cast  Abyssal Dive or  Devour on a different target while his tongue is in flight. Tongue Lash's range and travel speed can be increased by Tahm Kench's size.
2.html: Tahm Kench is unable to move, attack, or cast Abyssal Dive or Devour on a different target while his tongue is in flight. Tongue Lash's range and travel speed can be increased by Tahm Kench's size.
markedPassages: unable
Abyssal Dive
Devour

0.text: Active: Tahm Kench  channels for 1.35 seconds as he dives into the waters, then  blinks to the target location after a 0.15-second delay and remains  unable to act for 0.65 seconds after the channel completes. Abyssal Dive grants  sight of the area during the channel.
0.html: Active: Tahm Kench channels for 1.35 seconds as he dives into the waters, then blinks to the target location after a 0.15-second delay and remains unable to act for 0.65 seconds after the channel completes. Abyssal Dive grants sight of the area during the channel.
markedPassages: channels
blinks
unable to act
sight

1.text: Tahm Kench emerges to deal magic damage to nearby enemies, as well as  knock up and  stun them for 1 second. If this hits at least one enemy  champion, 40% of its  cooldown and  mana cost are refunded.
1.html: Tahm Kench emerges to deal magic damage to nearby enemies, as well as knock up and stun them for 1 second. If this hits at least one enemy champion, 40% of its  cooldown and  mana cost are refunded.
markedPassages: knock up
stun
champion
cooldown
mana

2.text: Enemies can see the indicator for Tahm Kench's destination after he has channeled for 0.75 seconds. Abyssal Dive will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
2.html: Enemies can see the indicator for Tahm Kench's destination after he has channeled for 0.75 seconds. Abyssal Dive will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Passive: Tahm Kench stores a portion of the post-mitigation damage he takes as grey health on his health bar, increased while there are at least 2 nearby  visible enemy champions either dead or alive. He can store up to 300% of his maximum health.
0.html: Passive: Tahm Kench stores a portion of the post-mitigation damage he takes as grey health on his health bar, increased while there are at least 2 nearby visible enemy champions either dead or alive. He can store up to 300% of his maximum health.

1.marker: INCREASED DAMAGE STORED INTO GREY HEALTH:

markedPassages: visible

1.text: While Thick Skin is off cooldown, and after 4 seconds without taking damage, Tahm Kench rapidly consumes his grey health to restore 45% − 100% (based on level) of the amount,  healing 10% of his maximum health every 0.264 seconds.
1.html: While Thick Skin is off cooldown, and after 4 seconds without taking damage, Tahm Kench rapidly consumes his grey health to restore 45% − 100% (based on level) of the amount, healing 10% of his maximum health every 0.264 seconds.
markedPassages: healing

2.text: Active: Tahm Kench converts his current grey health into a  shield that lasts for 2.5 seconds.
2.html: Active: Tahm Kench converts his current grey health into a shield that lasts for 2.5 seconds.
markedPassages: shield

0.text: Active: Tahm Kench swallows the target  champion for up to 3 seconds, rendering them  untargetable and  displacement immune. Devour can be cast on enemies only with 3 stacks of  An Acquired Taste.
0.html: Active: Tahm Kench swallows the target champion for up to 3 seconds, rendering them untargetable and displacement immune. Devour can be cast on enemies only with 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste.
markedPassages: champion
untargetable
displacement immune
An Acquired Taste

1.text: If the target is an ally, they become  unable to act and are granted a  shield for 2.5 seconds, refreshing after being  Regurgitated. Tahm Kench will also gain  40% bonus movement speed for 3 seconds and is unable to cast movement spells besides  Abyssal Dive while an ally is swallowed.
1.html: If the target is an ally, they become unable to act and are granted a shield for 2.5 seconds, refreshing after being Regurgitated. Tahm Kench will also gain  40% bonus movement speed for 3 seconds and is unable to cast movement spells besides Abyssal Dive while an ally is swallowed.
markedPassages: unable to act
shield
Regurgitated
40% bonus movement speed
Abyssal Dive

2.text: After a 1 second delay, Tahm Kench can cast  Regurgitate within the duration, and automatically does so afterwards. The swallowed ally can also input a movement command to force this cast in the target direction, unless they are  immobilized.
2.html: After a 1 second delay, Tahm Kench can cast Regurgitate within the duration, and automatically does so afterwards. The swallowed ally can also input a movement command to force this cast in the target direction, unless they are immobilized.
markedPassages: Regurgitate
immobilized

3.text: An Acquired Taste Bonus: The target is  suppressed while swallowed. Tahm Kench will also be  grounded and  slowed by 40% while an enemy is swallowed.
3.html: An Acquired Taste Bonus: The target is suppressed while swallowed. Tahm Kench will also be grounded and slowed by 40% while an enemy is swallowed.
markedPassages: An Acquired Taste
suppressed
grounded
slowed

4.text: If Tahm Kench is performing  Abyssal Dive,  Regurgitate will not automatically cast until after he finishes.
4.html: If Tahm Kench is performing Abyssal Dive, Regurgitate will not automatically cast until after he finishes.
markedPassages: Abyssal Dive
Regurgitate

0.text: Active: Tahm Kench  spits the swallowed champion in the target direction. If they are an enemy, he deals magic damage to them at the end of the displacement.
0.html: Active: Tahm Kench spits the swallowed champion in the target direction. If they are an enemy, he deals magic damage to them at the end of the displacement.

0.content: 100 / 250 / 400 (+ 15% (+ 5% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health)

Unique – Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
Unique – Endure: After taking damage from a champion or large monster, gain health regeneration equal to 0 − 40 (based on current missing health) health over 8 seconds. Reduced to「 66% effectiveness 」「 0 − 26.4 (based on current missing health) 」 on ranged champions or when triggered by area of effect, damage over time, or proc.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Immolate: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 12 (+ 1% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within 325 (+ 100% bonus size) units, increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage.
Unique – Snowbind: Basic attacks create a 250 radius frost field around the target that lasts for 1.5 seconds and deals ( 12 − 85 / 6 − 42.5) (based on level) magic damage to all enemies inside initially and slows all enemies within by ( 25% / 12.5%) (+ ( 4% / 2%) per 1000 maximum health) for 1.5 seconds (( 4 / 6) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 100 bonus health and 6% increased size.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IMMOLATE: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 12 (+ 1% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within  325 (+ 100% bonus size) units, increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage.

passive.originText: UNIQUE – THORNS: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 20% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with 25%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.  Immobilizing enemy champions also inflicts them with 40%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

st_flatStats0.concerningText: If the target is an ally, they become  unable to act and are granted a  shield for 2.5 seconds, refreshing after being  Regurgitated. Tahm Kench will also gain  40% bonus movement speed for 3 seconds and is unable to cast movement spells besides  Abyssal Dive while an ally is swallowed.

Active: Tahm Kench lashes his tongue in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and  slows them by 50% for 2 seconds. If this hits an enemy  champion, Tahm Kench also  heals himself.

st_flatStats1.concerningText: Active: Tahm Kench lashes his tongue in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and  slows them by 50% for 2 seconds. If this hits an enemy  champion, Tahm Kench also  heals himself.

st_flatStats0.concerningText: Passive: Tahm Kench stores a portion of the post-mitigation damage he takes as grey health on his health bar, increased while there are at least 2 nearby  visible enemy champions either dead or alive. He can store up to 300% of his maximum health.
